info.title: SA2 MVP API Specification
info.description: API specification for SA2 MVP platform, covering catalog, contract, financial, and placement domains.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all products with optional filtering and pagination.

post.description: Create a new product with detailed information.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product.

post.description: Publish a product to make it available for purchase.
Unpublish a product to make it unavailable for purchase.
Revert a published product back to draft status.
Add an item to a product.

delete.description: Remove an item from a product.

patch.description: Update the sort order of product items.

200.description: Product item sort order updated successfully

get.description: Create a snapshot of a product for contract creation.
Retrieve a list of all contracts with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: signedAfter
parameters.description: Filter contracts signed after a specific date

parameters.name: signedBefore
parameters.description: Filter contracts signed before a specific date

post.description: Create a new contract for a student.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific contract.

post.description: Activate a contract to make it usable.
Sign a contract to make it official.
Suspend a contract with a reason.
Terminate a contract with a reason.
Consume a service from a contract.
Add an amendment ledger entry to a contract.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all mentor appeals with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: mentorUserId
parameters.description: Filter appeals by mentor user ID

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific mentor appeal.

patch.description: Reject a mentor appeal with a reason.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all settlements with optional filtering.

parameters.name: mentorUserId
parameters.description: Filter settlements by mentor user ID

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific settlement.
Retrieve a list of all job positions with optional pagination.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific job position.
Retrieve a list of all job applications with optional pagination.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific job application.

patch.description: Update the status of a job application.

get.description: Retrieve the status history of a job application.

patch.description: Rollback the status of a job application to a previous state.

200.description: Job application status rolled back successfully

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configuration rules with optional pagination.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific configuration rule.

targetUserPersonas.description: Target user personas for this product

price.description: Product price stored as string for decimal precision

targetUserPersonas.description: Target user personas for this product

price.description: Product price stored as string for decimal precision

targetUserPersonas.description: Target user personas for this product

price.description: Product price stored as string for decimal precision
Product item price stored as string for decimal precision

relatedId.description: Related ID (e.g., session ID, class ID)

tags.name: Catalog - Admin
tags.description: Admin operations for product catalog management
